title: If ever there was a year to donate too much - this is it! So, I created a list of Senate and Governor Races to donate too! Recapture the SENATE! VOTE BLUE!
selftext:
**Recapture the SENATE! VOTE BLUE!**

Dems main GOAL = restore 60 seat senate Dem. majority.

Dems offer America a HIGH QUALITY WINNING SENATE SLATE for 2020!

**If ever there was a year to donate too much - this is it!**

1. **Long shot candidates but worth it to make them competitive state**

Win 60 and 4 in 20!! VOTE BLUE!!
